00086     function main()     {
00087                         // Initializes the module. Done in this function because we may need to re-initialize if data is submitted!
00088                 global $SOBE,$BE_USER,$LANG,$BACK_PATH,$TCA_DESCR,$TCA,$CLIENT,$TYPO3_CONF_VARS;
00089                 
00090                 $this->db                = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB'];
00091                 $theOutput.=$this->pObj->doc->spacer(5);
00092                 $theOutput.=$this->pObj->doc->section($LANG->getLL("title"),$LANG->getLL('description'),0,1);
00093         
00094         
00095                 // Cache the GET/POST option value variables
00096                 $this->setValues();
00097 
00098                 //First, display the options/download form.
00099                 //This is displayed regardless of whether anything else is currently displaying or not.
00100                 //If this is the first go-around, this is the only thing that will be displayed.
00101                 $theOutput .= $this->showForm();
00102 
00103                 // If this is the 2nd go-around and the user has clicked a button, a GET or POST
00104                 // variable will be set telling us what to do.  Here we check for these variables
00105                 // and act accordingly.
00106                 
00107                 
00108                 // check for update/display command for access list
00109                 if ( t3lib_div::_GP( 'tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_command_display' ) )
00110                 {
00111                         if ($this->debug) echo 'tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_command_display<br>';
00112                         $theOutput .= $this->doDisplay( 'tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_command_display' );
00113                 }
00114                 
00115                 // check for download command (download current access list)
00116                 elseif ( t3lib_div::_GP( 'tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_command_download' ) )
00117                 {
00118                         $theOutput .= $this->doDownload( 'tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_command_download' );
00119                 }
00120                 
00121                 
00122                 return $theOutput;
00123         }

00130         function showForm()
00131         {
00132                 $output = '';
00133                 
00134                 $output .= $this->showOptionsRegistrationErrReport();
00135                 
00136                 return $output;
00137         }

00144         function showOptionsRegistrationErrReport()
00145         {
00146                 global $LANG;
00147                 $output = '';
00148                 
00149                 $break                                          = '<br />';
00150                 
00151                                                                 
00152                 
00153                 //Show title section with a bar background and uppercase title text
00154                 $title                                          = $this->pObj->doc->section( 
00155                                                                                 $LANG->getLL('report.registrationerr.options.sectiontitle')
00156                                                                                 , $LANG->getLL('report.registrationerr.options.helptext')
00157                                                                                 , 0
00158                                                                                 , 1
00159                                                                                 );
00160                                                                                 
00161                                                                                 
00162                 //For the days input box, we redisplay the previously selected value, if any.  Otherwise the default.
00163                 //This section shown w/o a bar background and with non-uppercase text
00164                 $daysValue                                      = $this->reportRegistrationErrsOptionsDays;   
00165                 $days                                           = $this->pObj->doc->section(
00166                                                                                 $LANG->getLL('report.registrationerr.options.days.caption')
00167                                                                                 , $this->getFormElementDays('tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_options_days', $daysValue)
00168                                                                                 , 1
00169                                                                                 );
00170                 //2 submit buttons: 1 for display, the other for download, plus a reset button.
00171                 $submit                    = '<input type="submit"
00172                                         name="tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_command_display"
00173                                         value="'
00174                                     . $LANG->getLL( 'report.registrationerr.options.display.buttontext' )
00175                                     . '" />';
00176         $submit                    .= '&nbsp;';
00177         $submit                    .= '<input type="submit"
00178                                         name="tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_command_download"
00179                                         value="'
00180                                     . $LANG->getLL( 'report.registrationerr.options.download.buttontext' )
00181                                     . '" />';
00182         $submit                    .= '&nbsp;';
00183         $submit                    .= '<input type="reset" value="'
00184                                     . $LANG->getLL( 'report.registrationerr.options.reset.buttontext' )
00185                                     . '" />';
00186 
00187                 //assemble the form elements in order
00188                 $output .= $title
00189                                         . $this->pObj->doc->spacer(5)
00190                                         . $days
00191                                         . $this->pObj->doc->spacer(5)
00192                                         . $submit;
00193                 return $output;
00194         }

00203     function getFormElementDays ( $fieldname, $value='' )
00204     {
00205         $string                    = 
00206             '<input type="text"'
00207                 .' name="' . $fieldname . '"'
00208                 .' size="' . $this->inputSize .'"' 
00209                                 .' value="' . $value . '" />'
00210         ;
00211 
00212         return $string;
00213     }

00219         function setValues()
00220         {
00221                 if ($this->debug) {echo "days:/" . t3lib_div::_GP( 'tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_options_days' ) . "/"; }
00222                 $this->reportRegistrationErrsOptionsDays = t3lib_div::_GP( 'tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_options_days' );
00223                 if (''==$this->reportRegistrationErrsOptionsDays) {
00224                         $this->reportRegistrationErrsOptionsDays = $this->reportRegistrationErrsOptionsDaysDefault; 
00225                 }
00226         }

00233         function doDisplay( $what ) 
00234         {
00235                 $output = '';
00236                 
00237                 if ('tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_command_display' == $what) {
00238                         $output .= $this->registrationErrsReportDisplay();
00239                 }
00240                 
00241                 return $output;
00242         }
00243         
00249     function doDownload ( $what )
00250     {
00251                 if ('tx_memberaccess_modfunc2_registrationerr_command_download' == $what) {
00252                         $output .= $this->registrationErrsReportDownload();
00253                 }
00254     }
00255         
00261     function registrationErrsReportDownload()
00262     {
00263         global $LANG;
00264         
00265         $rows                = $rows = $this->registrationErrsReportGetRows();
00266         $rowsFormatted      = $this->registrationErrsReportFormatRows($rows);
00267 
00268         // convert rows to csv for download
00269         $rowsCsv                = '';
00270 
00271         foreach ( $rowsFormatted as $key => $value )
00272         {
00273             $rowsCsv            .= cbMkCsvString( $value );
00274         }
00275 
00276                 $filename                               = $this->getDownloadFilename(
00277             $LANG->getLL( 'report.registrationerr.downloads.basefilename' )
00278         );
00279                 
00280         // download members list
00281         // send to browser as download
00282         cbBrowserDownload( $filename, $rowsCsv );
00283         exit();
00284     }
00285 
00292         function getDownloadFilename( $basename ) {
00293                 
00294                 $dateFormatted          = date('F j Y', time() );  
00295                 $filename              = $basename . $dateFormatted . '.csv';
00296                 $filename              = $this->spaceToUnderscore( $filename );
00297                 return $filename;
00298         }
00299         
00305         function spaceToUnderscore($string)
00306         {
00307                 return preg_replace( '/ /', '_', $string);
00308         }
00309 
00314         function registrationErrsReportDisplay() 
00315         {
00316                 global $LANG;
00317                 
00318                 //get the rows
00319                 $rows = $this->registrationErrsReportGetRows();
00320                 
00321                 //and format the data, and convert to HTML with a title, before returning them.
00322                 return cbArr2Html( $this->registrationErrsReportFormatRows($rows), $LANG->getLL( 'report.registrationerrs.title' ) );
00323         }
00324 
00331         function registrationErrsReportGetRows()
00332         {
00333                 if ($this->debug) {
00334                         echo 'registrationErrsReportGetRows()<br>';
00335                 }
00336 
00337                 $SECONDS_PER_DAY = 86400;
00338 
00339                 $days = $this->reportRegistrationErrsOptionsDays;
00340                 
00341                 $today = time();
00342                 
00343                 //Set the time interval min/max
00344         $errortime_max = $today;
00345                 $errortime_min = $errortime_max - $days*$SECONDS_PER_DAY;
00346                 
00347                 $columns = 'email, errortime, errors ';
00348         $table = $this->table_registrationerrors;
00349                 $where = "errortime >= $errortime_min and errortime < $errortime_max ";
00350         $where .= ' AND hidden != 1 ';
00351                 $groupby = '';
00352                 $orderby = 'errortime, email';
00353                 $rows =  $this->db->exec_SELECTgetRows($columns, $table, $where, $groupby, $orderby  );
00354                 
00355                 if (!is_array($rows)) {
00356                         if ($this->debug) {
00357                                 echo ' $rows not an array';
00358                         }
00359                         $rows=array();
00360                 }
00361                 if ($this->debug) {
00362                         echo $columns; echo $where; 
00363                         echo 'Registration errors rows:';
00364                         foreach ( $rows as $row ) {
00365                                 print_r($row);
00366                                 //$output .= '';
00367                         }
00368                         reset( $rows );
00369                 }
00370                 return $rows;
00371         }
00372 
00381         function registrationErrsReportFormatRows( &$rows )
00382         {
00383                 //copy the original rows array to a working array
00384                 $rowsFormatted = $rows;
00385                 if ($this->debug) {
00386                         echo 'registrationErrsReportFormatRows( &$rows )';
00387                         echo 'count($rows): ' . count($rows);
00388                 }
00389                 
00390                 //for each row, substitute formatted text in the working array
00391                 for( $i=0; $i<count($rows); $i++ ) {
00392                         
00393                         $row = $rows[$i];
00394                         //time
00395                         $rowsFormatted[$i]['errortime'] = $this->formatEventTime('date', $row['errortime']);
00396                         
00397                         if ($this->debug) {
00398                                 echo ' iteration '.$i;
00399                                 echo ' '.$rowsFormatted[$i]['errortime'];
00400                         }
00401                 }
00402                 return $rowsFormatted;
00403         }
00404         
00415         function formatEventTime($type, $eventtime)
00416         {       
00417                 
00418                 $formattedText = '';
00419                 switch ($type) {
00420                         case 'date': $formattedText = date('F j, Y', $eventtime ); break;
00421                         case 'days': $formattedText = "$eventtime days"; break;
00422                         default: $formattedText = date('F j, Y', $eventtime ); 
00423                                 echo 'Error in getEventTimeFormatted.';
00424                                 break;
00425                 }
00426                 
00427                 return $formattedText;
00428         }
